verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David.) In the Lord <S%H3068><s%> I take <S%H2620><s%> refuge; <S%H2620><s%> How <S%H349><s%> can you say <S%H559><s%> to my soul, <S%H5315><s%> "Flee <S%H5110><s%> [as] a bird <S%H6833><s%> to your mountain; <S%H2022><s%>

For, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> bend <S%H1869><s%> the bow, <S%H7198><s%> They make <S%H3559><s%> ready <S%H3559><s%> their arrow <S%H2671><s%> upon the string, <S%H9199><s%> To shoot <S%H3384><s%> in darkness <S%H652><s%> at the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart. <S%H3820><s%>
If <S%H3588><s%> the foundations <S%H8356><s%> are destroyed, <S%H2040><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> can the righteous <S%H6662><s%> do <S%H6466><s%>? "

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is in His holy <S%H6944><s%> temple; <S%H1964><s%> the Lord's throne <S%H3678><s%> is in heaven; <S%H8064><s%> His eyes <S%H5869><s%> behold, <S%H2372><s%> His eyelids <S%H6079><s%> test <S%H974><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> tests <S%H974><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> And the one who loves <S%H157><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> His soul <S%H5315><s%> hates. <S%H8130><s%>

Upon the wicked <S%H7563><s%> He will rain <S%H4305><s%> snares; <S%H6341><s%> Fire <S%H784><s%> and brimstone <S%H1614><s%> and burning <S%H2152><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> will be the portion <S%H4521><s%> of their cup. <S%H3563><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is righteous; <S%H6662><s%> He loves <S%H157><s%> righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> The upright <S%H3477><s%> will behold <S%H2372><s%> His face. <S%H6440><s%>
